## Workflow Checklist (AGENTS.md)

- [ ] I read `AGENTS.md` and followed the workflow
- [ ] I worked on a branch and did not commit directly to `main`
- [ ] I ran `pre-commit run --all-files` after changes were final
- [ ] I ran `pytest tests/ -v` (or `scripts/ci_local.sh`)
- [ ] EN/ES docs are in sync (if user-facing behavior changed)
- [ ] No private data is included (`scan_results_private/`)

## Lista de verificacion (AGENTS.md)

- [ ] Lei `AGENTS.md` y segui el workflow
- [ ] Trabaje en una rama y no comite en `main`
- [ ] Ejecute `pre-commit run --all-files` cuando los cambios estaban finales
- [ ] Ejecute `pytest tests/ -v` (o `scripts/ci_local.sh`)
- [ ] La documentacion EN/ES esta sincronizada (si cambio el comportamiento)
- [ ] No se incluye informacion privada (`scan_results_private/`)

## Summary / Resumen

Describe the change briefly. / Describe el cambio brevemente.
